alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Pearl River; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 9:28PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Harrison, Hancock and south central Pearl River Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 928 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Kiln, or 10 miles north of Diamondhead, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln, Shoreline Park and Stennis Space Center. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 5 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Pearl River; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
